text: Dean "Dino" Bandiera (January 1, 1926 â€“ October 13, 2020) was a Canadian football player. He played for the Montreal Alouettes, Saskatchewan Roughriders, Winnipeg Blue Bombers and Calgary Stampeders. Bandiera retired from football in 1955 when he was "fired" by the Calgary Stampeders. His career began in 1946. He was born in Timmins, Ontario. Bandiera died on October 13, 2020 in Montreal, Quebec at the age of 94. ==References== Category:1926 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Calgary Stampeders players Category:Montreal Alouettes players Category:People from Timmins Category:Saskatchewan Roughriders players Category:Sportspeople from Ontario Category:Winnipeg Blue Bombers players
title: Dean Bandiera
